title: Topic 001 Question 144
body: Your company's new CEO recently sold two of the company's divisions. Your Director asks you to help migrate the Google Cloud projects associated with those divisions to a new organization node. Which preparation steps are necessary before this migration occurs? (Choose two.)
options: Remove all project-level custom Identity and Access Management (IAM) roles.
Identify inherited Identity and Access Management (IAM) roles on projects to be migrated.
Create a new folder for all projects to be migrated.
Remove the specific migration projects from any VPC Service Controls perimeters and bridges.
